summary: A documentary film on the life and works of director Kenji Mizoguchi.
cast: Takako Irie|Daisuke Itô|Kyôko Kagawa|Matsutarô Kawaguchi|Michiyo Kogure|Machiko Kyô|Yasuzô Masumura|Minoru Miki|Kazuo Miyagawa|Kakuko Mori|Masaichi Nagata|Ganjirô Nakamura|Masashige Narusawa|Kenichi Okamoto|Nobuko Otowa|Eitarô Ozawa|Tatsuo Sakai|Eitarô Shindô|Kaneto Shindô|Kinuyo Tanaka|Seiichirô Uchikawa|Kumeko Urabe|Kiyohiko Ushihara|Ayako Wakao|Isuzu Yamada|Fumiko Yamaji|Eijirô Yanagi|Yoshikata Yoda
keywords: osaka japan|male female relationship|japan|venice italy|unrequited love
title: Kenji Mizoguchi, la vida de un cineasta
